title: We Make Maple Syrup
description: In We Make Maple Syrup, students learn the steps for making syrup from maple sap. From tapping the maple tree to eating the syrup on pancakes, students see how one family spends time together. Students will have the opportunity to practice sequencing events as they read this informative story. Detailed illustrations support readers.
